rows.label: qev013401_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey, look! It's [ST:playername ]!
Wait, sorry. You don't know me, do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'm a BLADE, same as you! I'm with the Prospectors,
so I mostly handle jobs where folks need natural
resources surveyed and raw materials collected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0078
rows.name:
You're in Elma's team, right? I'll bet working under the
colonel lets you see a lot of tough assignments.
But you're still breathing, so it must be going okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev013401_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Sarona that you're doing all right.

rows.label: qev013401_JNK0020
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev013401_SEL0021
rows.name: Complain to Sarona about all your woes.

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0003
rows.name:
You certainly look like you could handle any task
folks throw your way. I'm jealous![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0004
rows.name:
Like right now? I've got a request in to survey
a mountain way up north. It's a nasty spot,
and I have no idea how to tackle it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Huh. I guess even people like you hit slumps.
It's almost a relief to hear that, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0006
rows.name:
But I can relate. I got a request to survey a
mountain way up north. It's a nasty spot,
and I have no idea how to tackle it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0007
rows.name:
The mountain itself is dangerous enough,
but then you add in all the weird wildlife...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0008
rows.name:
Not to mention it's been crawling with xenos
lately for some reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0009
rows.name:
Especially those reptile-like ones. The Ma-non or
whatever? I bet they're using their crazy high-tech
weapons to kill everything—indigens or humans![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev013401_SEL0031
rows.name: Confirm that the Ma-non are indeed crazed killers.

rows.label: qev013401_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev013401_SEL0041
rows.name: Scoff at Sarona's assertions about the Ma-non.

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0010
rows.name:
Right?! I heard they're plotting out all sorts of
nasty stuff in that spaceship of theirs. I think
they're planning to take over New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0011
rows.name:
No way! My buddy says they're all super dangerous.
They'll kill you five times before you hit the ground![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0012
rows.name:
If they wanted, the tech on that spaceship of
theirs could burn New LA to a crisp in seconds.
They're just biding their time, I tell you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0013
rows.name:
Me wandering alone on some treacherous peak
full of their kind sounds like crazy talk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0014
rows.name: So, uh... You free today?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0015
rows.name:
Come on, it'll be fun! Mountain climbing!
Who doesn't love a good hike, eh?
Let's go conquer this peak together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0016
rows.name:
I'll even split the reward fifty-fifty. All you have to
do is beat up any weird xenos we come across!
...Oh, and make sure I don't get fried.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0017
rows.name:
Whew, thanks! I've been so stressed out, I even had
a dream last night about being abducted by Ma-non!
They...did weird things to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0018
rows.name:
I gotta tell you, I was this close to just bailing
on the job entirely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_JNK0050
rows.name: Scold

rows.label: qev013401_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Sarona to take her work more seriously.

rows.label: qev013401_JNK0060
rows.name: Console

rows.label: qev013401_SEL0061
rows.name: Sympathize with Sarona.

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0019
rows.name:
Yeesh, sorry! Didn't know you were so serious,
geez...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0020
rows.name:
I want to be useful to the city too, you know?
I'm just scared.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0021
rows.name:
You're real easy to talk to, you know that?
Us BLADEs aren't robots—sometimes you get
a job you just don't feel like doing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0022
rows.name:
But I get that we don't always have the luxury of
being choosy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0023
rows.name:
I feel way better about going now that you're coming
along, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0024
rows.name:
I mean, I know we're going for serious work reasons,
but it should still be fun, right? Clean air? Nice views?
Mountains are great![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0025
rows.name:
I'll go ahead and wait for you at the foot of the
mountain, near the second terrane of Talon Rock.
Don't keep me waiting too long![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0026
rows.name:
There you are! Hey, did you remember to bring food?
What about warm clothes? Climbing tools?
Avalanche probe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0027
rows.name:
Between rockslides and falls, a mountain can be more
dangerous than any of the animals living on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0083
rows.name: Gotta stay focused, even if you know the area well![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0084
rows.name: Assure

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0085
rows.name: Tell Sarona that you're all good to go.

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0086
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0087
rows.name: Express how easy this will be for you.

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0090
rows.name:
Awesome! Oh, and on my way here, I did a bit of
preliminary digging just because, and I've already
found some crazy stuff![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0047
rows.name:
Wait, are you some kind of expert climber, too?
I knew I'd be leaving the fighting to you, but I hoped
I could at least be the Sherpa guide![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0048
rows.name:
Ah, well. Anyway, on my way here, I did a bit of
preliminary digging, and I've already found some
crazy stuff![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0066
rows.name:
Like, here I have some lionbone bort and foucaultium—
both minerals used in making Skells and weapons.
A pretty valuable find, that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0067
rows.name:
If we can find some more samples, we'll have enough
to run purity tests. Want to help me look?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0068
rows.name:
Great! Then let's meet back here once we've found
a few more samples of both. Sound good?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0069
rows.name:
Just be sure to watch out for wild animals. And xenos.
...Oh, and yetis, even though I don't think they exist.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0074
rows.name:
I don't see much lionbone bort or foucaultium here.
Why don't you try looking over that way?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0075
rows.name: And keep watch for wild animals and killer xenos![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0079
rows.name:
Shhh! You're safe now. Try to calm down, okay?
If you cry, that thing might hear you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0080
rows.name:
R-right. I understand. B-but are you sure?
About me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0081
rows.name:
I'm a Ma-non, you know? You called me a killer alien,
but but but then you helped me anyway...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0082
rows.name:
Y-yeah, well... I was only kidding!
It's a, uh...term of endearment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0028
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0029
rows.name: Ask Sarona what happened.

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0030
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0031
rows.name: Tell Sarona you're proud of her.

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0034
rows.name: Ah, [ST:playername ]! Perfect timing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0035
rows.name:
We were near this bridge-like formation up ahead
when a ferocious cinicula attacked. I just grabbed
this kid here and ran like the wind![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0038
rows.name: Ah, [ST:playername ]! Perfect timing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0040
rows.name:
What, this? Well, I couldn't just leave a little girl to get
eaten alive! Even if she IS a xeno.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0041
rows.name:
We were near this bridge-like formation up ahead
when we were suddenly attacked by a ferocious
mountain cinicula![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0044
rows.name:
Sorry to be a pain, but...do you think you could jog
over there and take care of it for me? You know?
Pop-pop, two in the hat?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0045
rows.name:
I'll look after this girl while you take care of business.
I can catch you up on the details after.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0052
rows.name:
This girl is still pretty panicked, and if we don't calm
her down soon, some other giant monster is bound to
appear. Some creatures smell fear, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0053
rows.name:
So please, go take care of that mountain cinicula.
You should be able to find it up ahead near the
natural bridge formation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0088
rows.name:
Yeesh, we could hear that cinicula's screams from here.
Hopefully we can get to the summit in peace now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0089
rows.name:
You're headed to the top to gather materials too, right,
Inisae? Want to come with us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0091
rows.name:
Oh...really? I mean, it's been so much fun having
someone to talk to...but but are you sure I won't
be getting in your way?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0092
rows.name:
Don't be silly! Besides, I owe you one for the candy
you gave me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0054
rows.name:
Oh! Speaking of! You've gotta try this chocolate,
[ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0055
rows.name:
This stuff is bananas! Ba! Nanas! ...By which I mean
crazy. Not that it tastes like bananas. Apparently,
it's all the rage with the Ma-non kids these days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_JNK0110
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev013401_SEL0111
rows.name: Taste some of the Ma-non chocolate.

rows.label: qev013401_JNK0120
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev013401_SEL0121
rows.name: Turn down the offer to try the chocolate.

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0056
rows.name:
It's sweet, but there's this perfect hint of bitter, right?
I haven't tasted anything like it in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0039
rows.name:
Well? What do you think? I mean, am I crazy, or is it
the most amazing thing in the history of things?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0057
rows.name:
You are 10 kinds of nuts for passing this up!
It's sweet, but there's this perfect hint of bitter.
Revolutionizes chocolate. I'm serious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0058
rows.name:
Yeesh, don't be afraid of it just because the Ma-non
made it! Kinda small minded if you ask me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0059
rows.name:
Mmm... Seriously though, how do you make this?
I wanna marry it. Then I want it stuffed into my
coffin when I die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0060
rows.name:
Er, well, the viscera of the cinicula are dried out and
condensed before being reconstituted with bile.
The resulting treat is both delicious AND nutritious, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0061
rows.name:
PFFFTHRRBPPPBBBT! NO! Are you SERIOUS, Inisae?!
Girl, you gotta tell me these things ahead of time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0062
rows.name:
Is that a problem? I know that ciniculas are dangerous
primordial creatures, but their flesh contains no poison
whatsoever, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0063
rows.name:
Almost wish it did...blech. Er, but no, there's no
problem, Inisae. It was still very nice of you to share.
Let's just...head for the summit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0064
rows.name:
Hey, [ST:playername ]?
Inisae and me are gonna walk and talk for a bit.
Meet you at the top, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0065
rows.name: Rrgh...nnh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0093
rows.name:
I-is that you...[ST:playername ]?
...Ah! Inisae![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0094
rows.name: Where's Inisae?! Is she with you?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_JNK0130
rows.name: Inform

rows.label: qev013401_SEL0131
rows.name: Tell Sarona you haven't seen Inisae.

rows.label: qev013401_JNK0140
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev013401_SEL0141
rows.name: Ask Sarona what happened.

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0095
rows.name: No?! ...But that must mean that thing carried her off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0096
rows.name:
Sorry. I shouldn't panic. I'm glad YOU kept calm
at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0097
rows.name:
I've read about a type of blatta that lives up here called
the abyssal blatta. I guess we found one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0098
rows.name:
We must have been gathering mineral samples in its
territory, which is why it got mad and dive-bombed us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0099
rows.name:
Inisae pushed me out of the way—she probably saved
my life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0100
rows.name: Then I saw the thing fly off into that cave up ahead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0101
rows.name: Please! You've gotta help me find Inisae![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013401_MSG0102
rows.name: I know we only just met, but she's...my friend.[ST:wait ]
